subject: Self Care
title: The Three Dimensions of Burnout
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Three Dimensions of Burnout.

hook.text: She loved teaching for years. Now she dreads Monday, snaps at students, and feels like a fraud. Three hits at once.

buildup.text: Christina Maslach identified three dimensions: emotional exhaustion, depersonalization, and reduced accomplishment.

discovery.text: Exhaustion drains energy. Depersonalization creates cynicism. Reduced accomplishment makes effort feel pointless.

twist.text: You can score high on one dimension and low on others. Burnout isn't all-or-nothing â€” it's a spectrum.

climax.text: Identify which dimension hits you hardest. Each one requires a different recovery strategy and approach.

punchline.text: Burnout has three faces. Know which one is yours.

quiz.question: What are Maslach's three dimensions of burnout?
